description: You have three choices for creating steam: /d/Solid Boilers/d/, /d/Liquid Boilers/d/, and /d/Solar Boilers/d/.
/d/Solid Boilers/d/ use solid fuels, like coal or wood.
/d/Liquid Boilers/d/ use liquid fuels, like lava or creosote.
/d/Solar Boilers/d/ use the power of the sun.

There are also two variants of each boiler type: /d/Low Pressure/d/ and /d/High Pressure/d/. /d/High Pressure/d/ boilers produce more steam and consume more fuel than /d/Low Pressure/d/ boilers, but they are more expensive to make.
Alongside /d/Fuel/d/, you must provide /d/Water/d/ to your boiler, or I will play "Me and the Birds by Duster" on full blast.
Machines require a constant supply of steam while running or else the process will stop and the progress of the recipe will be lost.
